title: Spiritual Weapon
content:
ual Weapon is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Spiritual Weapon is a Lvl 2 Spell from the Evocation school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Baldur's Gate 3 Spiritual Weapon Information

Description: Summon a floating, spectral weapon that attacks your enemies alongside you. It gets access to Weapon Actions typical to the weapon class you choose: Greataxe: Lacerate, Greatsword: Lacerate Halberd: Lacerate Maul
